kv3.10:7.1: Nanu asaṃvarā saṃvaro sīlaṃ, atthi devesu saṃvaroti?
kv3.10:7.3: Atthi devesu asaṃvaro, yamhā asaṃvarā saṃvaro sīlanti?
kv3.10:8.2: Hañci asaṃvarā saṃvaro sīlaṃ, atthi devesu saṃvaro, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv3.10:8.3: “atthi devesu asaṃvaro, yamhā asaṃvarā saṃvaro sīlan”ti.
kv3.10:8.6: ‘asaṃvarā saṃvaro sīlaṃ, atthi devesu saṃvaro’, no ca vattabbe—
kv3.10:8.7: ‘atthi devesu asaṃvaro, yamhā asaṃvarā saṃvaro sīlan’”ti micchā.
kv3.10:9.2: “atthi devesu asaṃvaro, yamhā asaṃvarā saṃvaro sīlan”ti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv3.10:9.5: “vattabbe kho ‘asaṃvarā saṃvaro sīlaṃ, atthi devesu saṃvaro’, no ca vattabbe—
kv3.10:9.6: ‘atthi devesu asaṃvaro, yamhā asaṃvarā saṃvaro sīlan’”ti micchā.
kv3.10:10.1: Atthi manussesu saṃvaro, atthi tattha asaṃvaroti?
kv3.10:10.3: Atthi devesu saṃvaro, atthi tattha asaṃvaroti?
kv3.10:11.1: Atthi devesu saṃvaro, natthi tattha asaṃvaroti?
kv3.10:11.3: Atthi manussesu saṃvaro, natthi tattha asaṃvaroti?
kv3.10:16.1: Atthi manussesu pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, atthi tattha pāṇātipātoti?
kv3.10:16.3: Atthi devesu pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, atthi tattha pāṇātipātoti?
kv3.10:17.1: Atthi manussesu surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇi, atthi tattha surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānanti?
kv3.10:17.3: Atthi devesu surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇi, atthi tattha surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānanti?
kv3.10:18.1: Atthi devesu pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, natthi tattha pāṇātipātoti?
kv3.10:18.3: Atthi manussesu pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, natthi tattha pāṇātipātoti?
kv3.10:19.1: Atthi devesu surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇi, natthi tattha surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānanti?
kv3.10:19.3: Atthi manussesu surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇi, natthi tattha surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānanti?
kv3.10:20.3: Sabbe devā pāṇātipātino adinnādāyino kāmesumicchācārino musāvādino surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyinoti?
